sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the State Colleges and Universities Gasohol Use Act.

sections.heading: Requirement.
sections.text:
All gasoline burning motor vehicles owned or
leased by any State college or university shall be equipped to operate on
ethanol blended gasoline as defined in Section 3-40 of the Use Tax Act and
are required to be operated on ethanol blended gasoline whenever ethanol
blended gasoline is available.
